languages.text: {n}Лицо Маражая искажает гримаса отчаяния. Он переводит взляд с архонта на вас, затем на Иремерисс и обратно. Но не осмеливается сказать и слова против.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Маражая искажает гримаса отчаяния. Он переводит взляд с архонта на вас, затем на Иремерисс и обратно. Но не осмеливается сказать и слова против.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai's face contorts in despair. His gaze shifts from the Archon to you, then to Yremeryss and back, but he does not dare to utter an objection.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Маражая искажает гримаса отчаяния. Он переводит взляд с архонта на вас, затем на Иремерисс и обратно. Но не осмеливается сказать и слова против.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's face contorts in despair. His gaze shifts from the archon to you, then to Yremeryss and back, but he dares not utter an objection.{/n}
{n}Marazhai's face contorts in despair. His gaze shifts from the archon to you, then to Yremeryss and back, but he dares not utter an objection.{/n}
{n}Marazhai's face contorts in despair. His gaze shifts from the Archon to you, then to Yremeryss and back, but he does not dare to utter an objection.{/n}
{n}Marazhai's face contorts in despair. His gaze shifts from the Archon to you, then to Yremeryss and back, but he does not dare to utter an objection.{/n}
{n}Marazhai's face contorts in despair. His gaze shifts from the Archon to you, then to Yremeryss and back, but he does not dare to utter an objection.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的脸在绝望中扭曲着。他将目光从执政官身上移到了你身上，随后又移到了伊芮梅莉斯身上，但他不敢开口反对。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face contorts in despair. His gaze shifts from the Archon to you, then to Yremeryss and back, but he does not dare to utter an objection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的脸在绝望中扭曲着。他将目光从执政官身上移到了你身上，随后又移到了伊芮梅莉斯身上，但他不敢开口反对。{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの顔が絶望で歪んだ。彼の視線はアーコンからこちらの方へと向けられ、イレメリスからまたこちらの顔を伺ったが、決して異議を唱えようとはしない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face contorts in despair. His gaze shifts from the Archon to you, then to Yremeryss and back, but he does not dare to utter an objection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの顔が絶望で歪んだ。彼の視線はアーコンからこちらの方へと向けられ、イレメリスからまたこちらの顔を伺ったが、決して異議を唱えようとはしない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Marazhai se retuerce de desesperación. Su mirada pasa del Arconte a ti, y después a Yremeryss antes de volver contigo, pero no osa objetar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face contorts in despair. His gaze shifts from the Archon to you, then to Yremeryss and back, but he does not dare to utter an objection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Marazhai se retuerce de desesperación. Su mirada pasa del Arconte a ti, y después a Yremeryss antes de volver contigo, pero no osa objetar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une grimace de désespoir déforme les traits de Marazhai. Ses yeux se posent tour à tour sur l'archonte, Yremeryss et vous, mais il n'ose pas émettre la moindre objection.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face contorts in despair. His gaze shifts from the Archon to you, then to Yremeryss and back, but he does not dare to utter an objection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une grimace de désespoir déforme les traits de Marazhai. Ses yeux se posent tour à tour sur l'archonte, Yremeryss et vous, mais il n'ose pas émettre la moindre objection.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Gesicht verzerrt sich vor Verzweiflung. Sein Blick wandert vom Archen zu dir, dann zu Yremeryss und zurück, aber er wagt es nicht, einen Einwand zu äußern.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face contorts in despair. His gaze shifts from the Archon to you, then to Yremeryss and back, but he does not dare to utter an objection.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Gesicht verzerrt sich vor Verzweiflung. Sein Blick wandert vom Archen zu dir, dann zu Yremeryss und zurück, aber er wagt es nicht, einen Einwand zu äußern.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın yüzü umutsuzlukla çarpılıyor. Bakışları Arkon'dan sana, ardından Yremeryss'e, ondan sonra da tekrar sana kayıyor ama herhangi bir itiraz dile getirme cüretini göstermiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's face contorts in despair. His gaze shifts from the Archon to you, then to Yremeryss and back, but he does not dare to utter an objection.{/n}
